document.full_text: a russian appeals court upheld a multi-billion-dollar theft and money laundering conviction against jailed former oil tycoon mikhail khodorkovsky on tuesday and reduced his 14-year prison sentence by one year.
document.title: russian court upholds khodorkovsky conviction
lines_and_colors: a russian appeals court upheld a multi-billion-dollar theft and money laundering conviction against jailed former oil tycoon mikhail khodorkovsky on tuesday and reduced his 14-year prison sentence by one year.
